title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile "These Were the Years of Our Summer, Now the Days Are Grey""
inscribed: Inscribed in pastel in lower right corner:  THESE/WERE THE/YEARS OF/OUR SUMMER/NOW THE DAYS/ARE GREY
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Abstract, brightly colored landscape with circular and elliptical forms, houses in gray in right corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile "These Were the Years of Our Summer, Now the Days Are Grey"".
Pastel, graphite on  white paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-111.
